entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who has fallen motionless on the floor. She is called out by name by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who falls to his knees beside Hermione and tries to protect her from the Death Eater.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as someone who crawls rapidly towards Hermione under the desk with his wand held up in front of him.

entities.name: antonin dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is mentioned as a Death Eater who has murdered the Prewetts and is now pointing his wand directly at Harry.

relationships.description: Harry falls to his knees beside Hermione, indicating that he is concerned for her well-being.
Neville crawls rapidly towards Hermione under the desk with his wand held up in front of him, indicating that he is also concerned for her well-being.
Dolohov points his wand directly at Harry, indicating that Harry is the target of Dolohov's attack.
